content.question: In the excerpt above, the leading tone is correctly resolved on which of the following beats?

unit.text: 4: Harmony and Voice Leading I - Chord Function, Cadence, and Phrase

skill.text: Skill 2.E: Use symbols and terms to describe and apply harmonic, melodic, and rhythmic procedures of 18th-century voice leading (up to 4 voices) in notated music.
